<div style="border:1px solid black;">

`{bm-disable-all}`

EquivalentFractionProperty.py produced the following alternate forms ...

```
equivalent_fraction_basic with input (a*b)/(c*b) ...
    ((a*b)/(c*b)) = ((a/c)*(b/b))
equivalent_fraction_basic with input (5*7)/(3*7) ...
    ((5*7)/(3*7)) = ((5/3)*(7/7))
```

</div>

`{bm-enable-all}`
